summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4886 for the improvement of East 36th Street, from 47th Avenue Northeast to a point approximately 275 feet east of 47th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56036, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
